sentences.en: Another cognate cause of crime of violence was the family tyranny.
sentences.cn: 导致凶暴的犯罪行为的另一个同类的原因是家庭内的专制主义。

sentences.en: Cognate in common use is considered phonetic loan characters, which include substitute of homophone.
sentences.cn: 同音代替是假借的一种形式,也是“依声托事”;本字不等于初文, 更不是后起字.

sentences.en: English apple and German apfel are cognate words.
sentences.cn: 英语的apple和德语的apfel是同源词(或同根词).

sentences.en: English, Dutch and German are cognate languages.
sentences.cn: 英语 、 荷兰语、德语是同语族的语言.

sentences.en: German and Dutch are cognate languages.
sentences.cn: 德语和荷兰语为同源语言.

sentences.en: I consulted Uncle Mumford concerning this and cognate matters.
sentences.cn: 我征求了蒙佛大叔关于这件事情和与此有关联的问题的意见.

sentences.en: Mathematics and astronomy are cognate sciences.
sentences.cn: 数学和天文学是互相关联的科学.

sentences.en: Physics and astronomy are cognate science.
sentences.cn: 物理学及天文学为同性质的科学.

sentences.en: Physics and astronomy are cognate sciences.
sentences.cn: 物理学与天文学是互有关联的科学.

sentences.en: Some words should combine with their cognate words to get the meanings.
sentences.cn: 一些法律使用域词语和其同源词构成训释.

sentences.en: Such cognate words don't necessarily mean the same.
sentences.cn: 很必然地,这些原本的同源词看上去就并不相像了.

sentences.en: The characters at the same Character's family are belonging to this family's differentiation, we call it" the cognate character" for short.
sentences.cn: 处于同一字族的汉字都属于这个字族的“同族孳乳字”或“同族分化字”，简称“同族字”。

sentences.en: The German word'Haus'is cognate with the English word'house '.
sentences.cn: 德语的 Haus 一词和英语的house一词同源.

sentences.en: There is no Hebrew or Greek cognate word in the Biblical text to reflect the modern term "same-sex orientation" or "homosexuality."
sentences.cn: 在《圣经》文本中，没有关于现代概念“同性恋取向”或“同性恋”的希伯来文或希腊文的同源词。

sentences.en: This one branch is the Liberty of Thought: from which it is impossible to separate the cognate liberty of speaking and of writing.
sentences.cn: 这条支线就是思想的自由。 把同源的言语的自由与写作的自由和思想的自由分开是不可能的。

trans.tran_cn: 同宗的，同根的，同语系的
trans.tran_en: cognate words or languages have the same origin
a word in one language that has the same origin as a word in another language
